terms_page_description: Please review the Terms of Service for GAS Library Hub.
terms_title: GAS Library Hub Terms of Service
terms_introduction: These Terms of Service (the "Terms") govern your use of GAS Library Hub (the "Service") provided by wywy LLC ("we," "us," or "our"). By using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms_article_1_content: These Terms apply to all relationships between users and our company regarding the use of this Service. Our company may establish various provisions ("Individual Provisions") such as rules for use in addition to these Terms regarding this Service. These Individual Provisions, regardless of their names, constitute part of these Terms. In cases where the provisions of these Terms conflict with the provisions of the Individual Provisions mentioned above, the Individual Provisions shall take precedence unless otherwise specified in the Individual Provisions.
terms_article_2_content_1: User registration is completed when a registration applicant agrees to these Terms, applies for user registration according to the method prescribed by our company, and our company approves this application. Our company may not approve applications for user registration if we determine that the applicant has any of the following reasons, and we shall not be obligated to disclose any reasons for such decisions.
terms_article_2_point_1: When false information has been provided in the application for user registration
terms_article_2_point_2: When the application is from a person who has violated these Terms before
terms_article_2_point_3: When our company determines that user registration is otherwise inappropriate
terms_article_3_title: Article 3 (Management of User ID and Password)
terms_article_3_content: Users shall properly manage their user ID and password for this Service at their own responsibility. Users may not transfer, lend, or share their user ID and password with third parties under any circumstances. Our company shall consider any login made with a combination of user ID and password that matches the registered information as use by the user who registered that user ID. Our company shall not be liable for any damages caused by the use of user ID and password by third parties, except in cases where our company has willful intent or gross negligence.
terms_article_4_content: This Service is available free of charge. However, if we introduce paid plans in the future, we will notify users in advance and provide such services only with their consent.
terms_article_5_content_intro: Users are prohibited from engaging in the following acts when using this Service:
terms_article_5_point_1: Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
terms_article_5_point_3: Acts that infringe intellectual property rights such as copyrights, trademark rights, and others included in the content of this Service
terms_article_5_point_4: Acts that destroy or interfere with the functions of servers or networks of our company, other users, or other third parties
terms_article_5_point_5: Acts of commercially using information obtained through this Service
terms_article_5_point_6: Acts that may interfere with the operation of our company's services
terms_article_5_point_7: Acts of unauthorized access or attempting to do so
terms_article_5_point_8: Acts of collecting or accumulating personal information about other users
terms_article_5_point_9: Acts of using this Service for fraudulent purposes
terms_article_5_point_10: Other acts that our company deems inappropriate
terms_article_6_content_intro: Our company may suspend or interrupt the provision of all or part of this Service without prior notice to users if we determine that any of the following circumstances exist:
terms_article_6_point_1: When conducting maintenance, inspection, or updates of computer systems related to this Service
terms_article_6_point_2: When the provision of this Service becomes difficult due to force majeure such as earthquakes, lightning, fires, power outages, or natural disasters
terms_article_6_point_3: When computers or communication lines stop due to accidents
terms_article_6_point_4: When our company determines that the provision of this Service is otherwise difficult
terms_article_7_content_intro: Our company may, without prior notice, restrict all or part of a user's use of this Service or delete the user's registration if the user falls under any of the following:
terms_article_7_point_1: When any provision of these Terms has been violated
terms_article_7_point_2: When it is discovered that there are false facts in the registered information
terms_article_7_point_3: When our company determines that the use of this Service is otherwise inappropriate
terms_article_8_content: Our company does not guarantee, either explicitly or implicitly, that this Service is free from factual or legal defects (including defects, errors, bugs, rights violations, etc. related to safety, reliability, accuracy, completeness, effectiveness, fitness for a particular purpose, security, etc.). Our company shall not be liable for any damages caused to users arising from this Service. However, this disclaimer shall not apply if the contract between our company and users regarding this Service (including these Terms) constitutes a consumer contract as defined by the Consumer Contract Act.
terms_article_9_content: Our company may change the content of this Service or discontinue the provision of this Service without notifying users, and shall not be liable for any damages caused to users thereby.
terms_article_10_content: Our company may change these Terms at any time without notifying users when deemed necessary. If a user begins using this Service after changes to these Terms, that user shall be deemed to have agreed to the changed Terms.
terms_article_11_content: Our company shall appropriately handle personal information acquired through the use of this Service in accordance with our company's "Privacy Policy."
terms_article_12_content: Notifications or contacts between users and our company shall be made according to the method prescribed by our company. Our company shall consider the currently registered contact information as valid and send notifications or contacts to such contact information unless there is a change notification from the user following the format separately prescribed by our company, and these shall be deemed to have reached the user at the time of transmission.
terms_article_13_title: Article 13 (Prohibition of Transfer of Rights and Obligations)
terms_article_13_content: Users may not transfer their position under the usage contract or rights or obligations under these Terms to third parties or provide them as collateral without prior written consent from our company.
terms_article_14_content: Japanese law shall be the governing law for the interpretation of these Terms. In the event of disputes arising in connection with this Service, the court having jurisdiction over the location of our company's head office shall have exclusive agreed jurisdiction.
terms_contact_content: For inquiries regarding these Terms, please contact our company.
privacy_page_description: Please review GAS Library Hub's privacy policy. This document explains how we handle personal information.
privacy_introduction: wywy LLC ("we," "us," or "our") establishes this Privacy Policy ("this Policy") regarding the handling of users' personal information in the services ("this Service") provided on this website.
privacy_section_2_content: We may ask for personal information such as names and email addresses when users register for use. Specifically, we collect information through the following methods:
privacy_section_2_point_1: During service registration or subsequent information updates
privacy_section_2_point_2: Through contact forms or email communications
privacy_section_2_point_3: During participation in various campaigns or events
privacy_section_3_content: The purposes for which we collect and use personal information are as follows:
privacy_section_3_point_1: To provide and operate this Service
privacy_section_3_point_2: To respond to inquiries from users (including identity verification)
privacy_section_3_point_3: To send emails about new features, updates, campaigns, etc. of services currently used by users and other services provided by our company
privacy_section_3_point_4: To contact users as necessary for maintenance, important notices, etc.
privacy_section_3_point_5: To identify users who violate the Terms of Service or attempt to use services for fraudulent or improper purposes and refuse their use
privacy_section_3_point_6: To allow users to view, change, delete their registration information and view their usage status
privacy_section_4_content: We will not provide personal information to third parties without obtaining prior consent from users, except in the following cases. However, this excludes cases permitted by the Personal Information Protection Act and other laws:
privacy_section_4_point_1: When necessary for the protection of life, body, or property of a person and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
privacy_section_4_point_2: When particularly necessary for improving public health or promoting the sound development of children and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
privacy_section_4_point_3: When it is necessary to cooperate with national agencies, local governments, or their commissioned parties in executing affairs prescribed by law, and obtaining the consent of the person may hinder the execution of such affairs
privacy_section_4_point_4: When the following matters have been announced or published in advance and our company has notified the Personal Information Protection Committee
privacy_section_5_title: 4. Disclosure, Correction, and Deletion of Personal Information
privacy_section_5_content: When users wish to disclose, correct, add, delete, suspend use, erase, or stop third-party provision of their personal information held by our company, please contact us using the method prescribed by our company. Based on laws and regulations, we will promptly conduct necessary investigations and, based on the results, disclose, correct, etc. personal information and notify the person accordingly. When disclosure, correction, etc. of personal information requires substantial costs or is otherwise difficult to perform, and alternative measures necessary to protect the rights and interests of the person can be taken, we shall implement these alternative measures.
privacy_section_6_content: We take necessary and appropriate measures for the security management of personal information to prevent leakage, loss, or damage of personal information. We also provide necessary and appropriate supervision to employees and contractors who handle personal information.
privacy_section_7_title: 6. Use of Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy_section_7_content: This Service may use cookies and similar technologies to improve user convenience. This information is used to help users use our services more conveniently, analyze website usage, and improve services:
privacy_section_7_point_1: Understanding and analyzing user site usage
privacy_section_7_point_2: Providing features to improve user convenience
privacy_section_8_content: This Service may use Google's access analysis tool "Google Analytics." This Google Analytics uses cookies to collect access information. This feature can be disabled by disabling cookies, so please check your browser settings. To review Google Analytics' terms of use, click here. To review "How Google uses data when you use our partners' sites or apps," click here.
privacy_section_9_content: The contents of this Policy may be changed without notice to users, except for matters separately specified by laws and regulations or this Policy. Unless otherwise specified by our company, the changed Privacy Policy shall take effect from the time it is posted on this website.
privacy_section_10_content: For inquiries regarding this Policy, please contact the following:
privacy_contact_address: 8F Wind Ebisu Building, 2-4-8 Ebisunishi, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0021
meta_title_home: GAS Library Hub | Search & Share GAS Libraries Platform
meta_description_home: Accelerate your Google Apps Script (GAS) development with powerful libraries and tools. GAS Library Hub is an open community where developers worldwide discover, share, and contribute useful code for enhanced productivity.
meta_keywords_home: Google Apps Script, GAS, libraries, tools, automation, development, productivity, open source, JavaScript, Sheets, Gmail
gas_library_add_description: You can request to add a new GAS library. Please enter the GAS script ID and GitHub repository URL. The library will be published after approval by the administrator.
gas_script_id_help: Please enter the script ID of the library that can be found in the Google Apps Script editor.
github_repository_url_help: Please enter in the format "owner/repo". Example: microsoft/TypeScript
gas_library_add_success: GAS library addition request has been completed. Please wait for administrator approval.
add_request_flow_description: After submitting the request, an administrator will review the content and the library will be published only if approved.
add_request_conditions_description: Must be published as a Google Apps Script library
add_request_conditions_value: Must be useful and valuable to other users
add_request_review_description: Administrators will comprehensively judge technical quality, practicality, documentation completeness, etc.
gas_library_add_available: You will be able to add GAS libraries
account_create_terms: By creating a free account, you agree to the
